name: FurstDate: A Furry Dating Simulator 🐾
description:
Wishlist our new game My Furry Dragon:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818370/My_Furry_Dragon/

You are bored. To entertain yourself, you download a dating app called "FurstDate". This is how your love affairs begin...

FurstDate is the app where everyone can find their couple! MILFs, Goths, Tomboys - you want them? They are all yours, my friend, as long as you have enough passion for them!

• Ann, 26. The busiest one. Don't spend her time for something useless.
• Amanda, 36. The most experienced one. She knows exactly how to take care of you.
• Emma, 18. The shy one. She didn't have a single date in real life, but she dated hundreds of guys in "Otome" games.
• Zoey, 21. The sexy goth chic! Don't even try to approach her if you can't name 3 "Fur Division" songs.
• Hailey, 19. Likes to dominate guys. But who knows, maybe you're going to be an exception?

FurstDate is short furry dating simulator with five datable characters, each with their own unique personality. Find the girl of your dreams, ask for a date and have some fun.

Features:
• 5 datable characters!
• HD fully original artworks.
• ≈ 2 hours of content.
• Relaxing atmosphere.
